issue.title: [Rust] support column iteration for parquet row
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8552](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8552). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be useful to be able to iterate through all the columns in a parquet row.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8552?focusedCommentId=17091077) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7009
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7009>
